npcs.name: Guard Andrew
npcs.greeting: Hey? I'm not allowed to talk to prisoners, I guess.
npcs.has_item_response: Wow, thank you. You are not as bad as the guys say.
npcs.incorrect_item_response: What? How did you get this?!
npcs.in_room_alive: The hallway is patrolled by a single guard, Andrew. You know that guy: he's not exactly the brightest. He takes some pills and smokes on duty.
npcs.in_room_dead: You see the body of Andrew.

npcs.name: Prisoner William
npcs.greeting: Oh my god! The guards are everywhere! Don't let me die!
npcs.incorrect_item_response: What is this?! No, this is dangerous, I won't take it!
npcs.in_room_alive: You see Prisoner William. He looks like he's about to cry.
npcs.in_room_dead: You see the body of William.

npcs.name: Prisoner Leon
npcs.greeting: Heya, man. I heard there's useful stuff in the medical chamber. And that the freak Kevin is guarding the floor exit.
npcs.incorrect_item_response: Eh, thank you but keep it. I don't need it
npcs.in_room_alive: You see Prisoner Leon. He doesn't seem too bothered by being in prison.
npcs.in_room_dead: You see the body of Leon.

npcs.name: Prisoner David
npcs.greeting: I will have my revenge against the guards!
npcs.in_room_alive: You see Prisoner David. He is really angry and looks like he's about to attack guards on sight.
npcs.in_room_dead: You see the body of David.

npcs.name: Guard Kevin
npcs.greeting: YOU SCUM! I shall make you regret escaping that damned cell!
npcs.incorrect_item_response: Hahaha! The attempts to bribe me will not change your fate!
npcs.in_room_alive: You see Guard Kevin. Something about him seems off.
npcs.in_room_dead: You see the body of Kevin.

npcs.name: Guard Bob
npcs.greeting: Do not resist. I don't want to do more than necessary.
npcs.in_room_dead: You see the body of Bob.

npcs.name: Old Robot
npcs.in_room_alive: You see an Old Robot. It doesn't seem to be in the best condition.
npcs.in_room_dead: You see the destroyed Old Robot.

rooms.name: Cell
rooms.description:
They keep you in solitary confinement.
Your cell is small. Under your bed there is a hole leading down.

items.name: Cigarettes
items.clue: You don't have the healthiest habits. Neither does the guard, Andrew.
items.description: There is a pack of cigarettes laying around.

items.name: shard
items.clue: A shard of a ceramic plate. It is sharp.
items.description: You see a sharp ceramic shard.

items.name: Cell Key
items.clue: You could use it to unlock the cell door.

triggers.name: door
triggers.clue: A barred door. You can't squeeze through bars, but you can reach your hand out.
triggers.inRoomDescription: To the north of you, behind a barred door, is a hallway.
triggers.infoOnTriggered: To the north of you, behind a barred door, is a hallway. The door is now unlocked.

triggers.name: hole
triggers.clue: A hole leads down to a hideout you've made while the guards weren't looking.

triggers.name: Garbage
triggers.clue: There is a shard of a ceramic plate in garbage.
triggers.inRoomDescription: Garbage is piling up in the corner.

rooms.name: Hideout
rooms.description:
You have descended down, into your small hideout. Go west if you wish to return to your cell (will Andrew ever notice you're gone, though?).
Here you make plans and keep some of your things.

items.name: Lighter
items.clue: In a place like this, you need a spark in your life.

items.name: Drug
items.clue: Take it and you will sleep soundly

triggers.name: Periodic Table
triggers.clue: The periodic table hides the ventilation leading up to the staff room
triggers.inRoomDescription: A periodic table of elements hangs on the wall.
triggers.infoOnTriggered: After you have moved the periodic table, you see an open vent leading up to the staff room.

triggers.name: Sedatives
triggers.clue: Take enough of these and you will sleep soundly.

rooms.name: Staff
rooms.description:
You enter the staff room on the 2nd floor. Luckily, no one is here.
You see doors to the north and south of you. They lead to Upper Hallway and Lower Hallway respectively.
Inside the staff room you see multiple lockers, with guards' personal possessions. In the middle of the room is a cluttered table.

items.name: Duct tape
items.clue: You have some troubles finding the edge of the tape, but you manage to do it.

items.name: Pills
items.clue: Sclerosis pills prescribed to guard Andrew. He seems to forget to take them.
items.description: You see a blister pack of sclerosis pills

items.name: Reminders
items.clue: 'Don't forget to call Annie. Don't forget to watch the prisoner. Don't forget to buy groceries...', you read.
items.description: You see a bunch of reminders guard Andrew wrote to himself

triggers.name: Fingerprint reading panel
triggers.clue: A fingerprint of an authorized employee can open it
triggers.inRoomDescription: You see a fingerprint reading panel between the doors.
triggers.infoOnTriggered: The fingerprint reading panel is now unlocked.

triggers.name: Lockers
triggers.clue: You see a locker belonging to guard Andrew.

triggers.name: locker
triggers.clue: You find a pack of sclerosis pills and a LOT of reminders. Great.

rooms.name: Hallway 1
rooms.description:
You reach the west end of the hallway. Go east if you wish to return.
To the north, you see a door to the Storage.

rooms.name: Hallway 2
rooms.description: You are now in the middle of the Hallway. You can go east or west, or you can return south to your Cell. If you would ever need that.

items.name: fingerprint
items.clue: You could use the fingerprint to unlock the door in the Staff room
items.description: You see a piece of duct tape with a fingerprint

triggers.name: Guard Andrew
triggers.clue: You could use the duct tape to take Andrew's fingerprints. This will help you unlock the fingerprint reading panel in the staff room.

rooms.name: Hallway 3
rooms.description:
You've reached the east end of the Hallway. Go west if you wish to return.
You see a door, behind it is a staircase leading up.

items.name: Charge
items.clue: One charge to your cloning device. Will allow you to use your cloning device once.
items.description: You see a charge to your cloning device

triggers.name: Fingerprint reading panel
triggers.clue: A fingerprint of an authorized employee can open it
triggers.inRoomDescription: You see a fingerprint reading panel next to the door.
triggers.infoOnTriggered: The fingerprint reading panel is now unlocked.

rooms.name: Storage
rooms.description:
You have entered the storage - go south once you're done.
All sorts of stuff are kept here.

items.name: Charge
items.clue: One charge to your cloning device. Will allow you to use your cloning device once.
items.description: You see a charge to your cloning device

items.name: Cloning Device
items.clue: Your cloning device allows you to clone people
items.description: You see your most precious cloning device. You must take it now!

items.name: Useless cardboard box
items.clue: It's bulky and dusty, filled with old papers. You really don't need that...
items.description: You see a useless cardboard box.

items.name: Chocolate cookies
items.clue: These cookies are long past their expiration date...
items.description: You see a pack of chocolate cookies.

rooms.name: Upper Hallway 2
rooms.description:
Upper Hallway leads to the west, and to the south there's the Staff room.
You see a staircase leading down
There are also bars of another prison cell.

rooms.name: Upper Hallway 1
rooms.description:
Upper Hallway leads to the east. To the south you see a cross, indicating the Medbay.
There are also bars of another prison cell.

rooms.name: Medbay
rooms.description: The Medbay is in the middle of Upper and Lower Hallways. To the east there is also an exit. Should you go there right now?

items.name: Charge
items.clue: One charge to your cloning device. Will allow you to use your cloning device once.
items.description: You see a charge to your cloning device

rooms.name: Lower Hallway 1
rooms.description: Lower Hallway leads to the east. There is also the Medbay to the north of you.

rooms.name: Lower Hallway 2
rooms.description:
You are in the middle of the Lower Hallway.
You see the bars of another cell.

items.name: Charge
items.clue: One charge to your cloning device. Will allow you to use your cloning device once.
items.description: You see a charge to your cloning device.

rooms.name: Lower Hallway 3
rooms.description: You are in the eastern end of the Lower Hallway. The Staff room is to the north of you.

rooms.name: Exit
rooms.description: You see a staircase leading up. Is this your freedom?!
